parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the new repository to be created.

parameters.name: repositoryDescription
parameters.description: A comment or description about the new repository.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: One or more tag key-value pairs to use when tagging this repository. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: kmsKeyId
parameters.description: The ID of the encryption key. You can view the ID of an encryption key in the KMS console, or use the KMS APIs to programmatically retrieve a key ID. For more information about acceptable values for kmsKeyID, see KeyId in the Decrypt API description in the Key Management Service API Reference. If no key is specified, the default aws/codecommit Amazon Web Services managed key is used.

nested_items.name: repositoryMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about the newly created repository.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account associated with the repository.

nested_items.name: repositoryDescription
nested_items.description: A comment or description about the repository.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the repository was last modified, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the repository was created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: cloneUrlHttp
nested_items.description: The URL to use for cloning the repository over HTTPS.

nested_items.name: cloneUrlSsh
nested_items.description: The URL to use for cloning the repository over SSH.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the repository.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Key Management Service encryption key used to encrypt and decrypt the repository.
